name: ucronia-app-frontend
description: Frontend application for the Ucronia association
author: Bernardo Martï¿½nez Garrido

scripts.build-libs: ng build @bernardo-mg/authentication --configuration development && ng build @bernardo-mg/request --configuration development && ng build @bernardo-mg/ui --configuration development && ng build @bernardo-mg/form --configuration development && ng build @ucronia/domain --configuration development && ng build @ucronia/api --configuration development && ng build @bernardo-mg/security --configuration development && ng build @bernardo-mg/login --configuration development
scripts.build-libs-production: ng build @bernardo-mg/authentication --configuration production && ng build @bernardo-mg/request --configuration production && ng build @bernardo-mg/ui --configuration production && ng build @bernardo-mg/form --configuration production && ng build @ucronia/domain --configuration production && ng build @ucronia/api --configuration production && ng build @bernardo-mg/security --configuration production && ng build @bernardo-mg/login --configuration production
